data.text:
@ChristyCeeCK Health policy set by (ill-informed) opinion polls without recognition of SARS-COV-2 epidemiology and aerosol science. Where are the recommendations to clean the air? 

We all want normal. But let's make it a safe new normal that respects everyone's right to be part of society.
@ChristyCeeCK Governing by public opinion polls. What is the point to having a Government?
@ChristyCeeCK Guess they didn’t factor in transmission rate of variants during their conclusions. 🤷‍♀️

@ChristyCeeCK Yup. This’s the stuff that makes my blood boil. 

What’s the next memo say? “After 100 years of traffic lights, voters feel they have a handle on navigating intersections and would do better knowing that they can move through an intersection any time, at their own discretion.”
